Patrick D. Holmes

Patrick D. Holmes

Roboticist

I’m Patrick Holmes, a roboticist interested in developing safe robot planning and control algorithms, especially for working around humans. I am currently a Senior Engineer in Research at the University of Michigan. I received my PhD in Mechanical Engineering from the University of Michigan in August 2021, where I worked in ROAHM Lab under Prof. Ram Vasudevan.
